macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Rises to 6864 Points on January 2, Up 0.27%
items.summary: The US500 index closed at 6864 points on January 2, 2026, gaining 0.27% from the prior session amid mixed sector performance. Over the past month, it climbed 0.20% and is up 15.50% year-over-year.

items.title: Dow Jones Opens 0.17% Higher Led by Nvidia and Apple
items.summary: The Dow Jones Index rose 83 points or 0.17% on January 2, driven by gains in Nvidia (+2.84%), Caterpillar (+1.94%), and Apple (+1.83%), while Salesforce (-1.89%) and Visa (-1.63%) declined.

items.title: US Stocks Start 2026 Sharply Higher Approaching Record Highs
items.summary: US stocks surged on the first trading day of 2026, with Nasdaq 100 up over 1% and S&P 500 gaining over 0.5%, fueled by positive AI sector developments offsetting valuation concerns.

items.title: Nasdaq 100 Ends 0.2% Lower Amid Mixed Momentum
items.summary: US stocks erased early gains on January 2, with Nasdaq 100 down 0.2%, S&P 500 flat, and Dow up over 100 points, as software sector weakness contrasted other sectors.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Crypto Markets in Extreme Fear as 2026 Begins
items.summary: Markets show extreme fear sentiment on January 2, 2026, presenting buying opportunities for veteran investors despite panic. Analyst remains bullish on 2026 amid potential volatility.

items.title: Ethereum Staking Flippening Underway
items.summary: Ethereum staking is experiencing a 'flippening' event, highlighted in market analysis as a key development amid altcoin price action.

items.title: Bitcoin and Altcoin Price Analysis Signals Entries
items.summary: Detailed price analysis for Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SOL, and others like PEPE, AVAX shows potential scalp trades and strength in assets like CRV amid market dip.

items.title: January 15 Critical for Crypto Clarity Act Vote
items.summary: US Congress expected to vote on the Clarity Act on January 15, coinciding with MSCI index decisions for crypto companies, potentially impacting regulation.

items.title: Upcoming Tariffs and Government Shutdown Risks in January
items.summary: Potential tariffs and government shutdown in January 2026 could add volatility to crypto markets, alongside MSCI index changes.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: CES 2026 Preview: RGB TVs, New Laptops, and Chip Launches Expected
items.summary: Major tech companies are preparing for CES 2026 with announcements including RGB TVs from Samsung and LG, new laptops from HP, Dell, Asus, and Lenovo, Intel's Panther Lake chip debut, AMD's next Ryzen chips, and potentially the first Snapdragon X2 Elite laptops.

items.title: Lenovo Planning Major CES 2026 Presentation at the Sphere
items.summary: Lenovo is preparing what may be its biggest CES presentation ever, to be held at the Sphere venue.
